remarks: The vector sum operation for the constructed partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvafvadd.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvafvadd.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvadd.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvadd.v $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
dvafvadd $p |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> .+ = ( f e. T , g e. T |-> ( f o. g ) ) ) $.
$d K f g $.
$d T f g $.
$d W f g $.
